name: Kinjeno: Subterrain
description:
This is a prototype game that combines elements of the genres 'Celeste' and 'Metroidvania'. 

Controls: 

WASD/ARROW KEYS - MOVEMENT 

E - Dash

 ESCAPE - Volume Options

It's important to note that this prototype is still in the early stages of development and the assets used are not final. We are still in the process of creating and fine-tuning the game's art, sound, and mechanics. We would love to hear your feedback and suggestions as we continue to develop the game, so please feel free to reach out to us with any comments or questions in the community or @CatNerdStudios on twitter.

Kinjeno : Subterrain OST
